Introduction

Meret Manon Bannerman is a Ghanaian/Swiss-Italian singer and model under Geffen Records and HYBE Labels. She is best known as the oldest member of the global girl group KATSEYE.

Manon is recognized for her participation in the survival show "The Debut: Dream Academy", where she ranked 6th and qualified for debut, becoming the final member of KATSEYE.

On August 16, 2024, Manon officially debuted as a member of KATSEYE with their first EP "SIS (SOFT IS STRONG)".
